summary: You will always have 100% probability of successful pickpocket.
descriptionHtml:
I modified the \"fPickPocketMinChance\" and \"fPickPocketMaxChance\" to 100
That means in the worst case scenario (you at pickpocket level 1 crouching in public in front of your victim) will have 100% probability of success... in the best case scenario too LOL

Compatibility:
Only incompatible with mods that change \"fPickPocketMinChance\" and \"fPickPocketMaxChance\"
Can be placed anywhere you want (after the masters and the unofficial patches) in the loading order.
author: Cheats McGee
